root.name: 100 Bullets
root.description: OverviewSlated for release in 2004, 100 Bullets was an action game in development by Acclaim. The game was often compared to the Max Payne franchise due to its film noir style. However, Acclaim went bankrupt and the game was canceled.Game Revival In a press statement released by Japanese publishing company D3 Publisher, the game was set to make a comeback sometime in 2009. However, nothing came of this, and speculation leads to the game being revealed in 2010. Not much is known about the current state of 100 Bullets, except that this latest version has nothing to do with the previous Acclaim-developed title of the same name.
